tool_description: The OCR Conversion API is a powerful tool that enables the conversion of non-OCR (Optical Character Recognition) PDF files and images into OCR-enabled PDF documents. With this API, developers can integrate OCR capabilities into their applications, allowing users to easily extract text from scanned documents or images.
name: The OCR Conversion API
title: The OCR Conversion API

api_list.name: OCR Converter
api_list.description: The OCR Conversion API is a powerful tool that enables the conversion of non-OCR (Optical Character Recognition) PDF files and images into OCR-enabled PDF documents. With this API, developers can integrate OCR capabilities into their applications, allowing users to easily extract text from scanned documents or images.
